channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1451336247805239301
item.description: New cases are below predicted in both Ventura County and California. Hospitalization and ICU count are holding steady in both VC and CA. Humans are winning. #Covid19 data as of 10/20/21 from the CA Open Data Portal. 1/3 https://t.co/J6s6lYjHon

item.title: #fr @ 1451288792623628293
item.description: 🔹[J+9] Ce n’est pas tous les jours que le modèle européen nous modélise simultanément une dépression particulièrement creuse sur le proche Atlantique et un #Medicane en Méditerranée occidentale. #CuriositéMétéo #Notaforecast Via @ECMWF #12z #OpenData #wxtwitter https://t.co/Fc9lxPXbHO

item.title: #pt @ 1451280438165655557
item.description: Como é possível aceitar que Rossieli Soares, secretário que comanda a gestão menos transparente e mais autoritária da Seduc-SP nos últimos 25 anos, use o espaço da Fapesp para fazer propaganda política sobre "dados abertos" e descer a lenha em quem faz pesquisa de verdade? +

item.title: #en @ 1451227952167927809
item.description: Since a comprehensive resource with public bathroom information didn’t already exist, using public records requests, interviews and open data, I created a searchable map of all the barrier-free public restrooms I could find. (5/10) https://t.co/i6JSh2ZX0e

item.title: #ja @ 1451188833370865674
item.description:
【2021年10月20日 九州地方の火山性地震】
阿蘇山 ※注 ※火山性地震 14回 9⤴︎❗️ ※孤立型微動 122回 55↘︎ 霧島山（えびの高原（硫黄山）周辺）3回 12↘︎ 薩摩硫黄島 12回 6↗︎‼️ 口永良部島 6回 8⤵︎ 諏訪之瀬島 70回 100⤵︎⚠️
https://t.co/on808GLfue ﾒﾓ https://t.co/zZM9P475GH

item.title: #en @ 1451186861603364865
item.description:
The October Network Spotlight goes to... Oke Avwenagha!
She's nominated for being an amazing project manager for Team Hardy @ucl. Her organization and data standardization work across our network allows her team to support #openscience and #opendata easily. Thank you Oke! https://t.co/AWPdlwfFk4

item.title: #en @ 1451176999930810373
item.description:
The new #OECD Recommendation on enhancing access to data and #DataSharing will help governments develop coherent data governance policies & frameworks to unlock the benefits of #OpenData and cross-sector, cross-border data flows.
Find out more 👉 https://t.co/gkiHl1t6z7 https://t.co/9A4NTPBCC1

item.title: #fr @ 1451174471897952261
item.description: Olivier Véran semble ignorer dans ses déclarations les données publiques... "Il faut réunir d'urgence une commission d'enquête sur les possibles morts du fait du vaccin, et que le ministre de la Santé soit appelé à témoigner sous serment", affirme Eric @Verhaeghe @CStrateges. https://t.co/VjAOhE4nFt

item.title: #nl @ 1451162179017773058
item.description: @MarionKoopmans @EuropeVeo @emblebi @ReCoDID2 open data sharing...dat zou een enorme verbetering zijn..nu is er veel te veel data niet beschikbaar...modellen van het RIVM? data rond % (on)gevaccineeren in de ziekenhuizen? Dat laatste is NIET beschikbaar, we (nieuwsCONSUMENTEN) moeten maar geloven dat de cijfers kloppen)..etc

item.title: #en @ 1451154240949428229
item.description: @simongerman600 @Katapultmagazin It is so otterly silly, that I had to do similar with @OrdnanceSurvey #opendata. I found 60 named places beginning 'Otter' in GB. Many are clustered, particularly in Devon, meaning labels aren't visible on the map so I put them in a Google sheet. https://t.co/0QPNawjWsA https://t.co/2i0psI2ngd

🚨We are all under the same storm, but not everyone has an umbrella

item.title: #en @ 1451124917831798785
item.description:
ok I stumbled upon this website and I have to say.
its BEAUTIFUL. and it was done PRO BONO by open data developers. it's easy to understand, functional and represents the data well
you compare this with the RM70 million paid for the vaksincovid website.
https://t.co/jFKdAYUQsT

item.title: #en @ 1451121542881026052
item.description: Thanks to all the 213 funders openly sharing their data, we now 621,395 grants worth £110,498,411,683 plus grants in other currencies available to explore. You can search, filter, visualise and download the grants at https://t.co/2kEDnWH3r0 #OpenGrants #OpenPhilanthropy #OpenData https://t.co/FIJxGQH1My

item.title: #en @ 1451116379646607364
item.description: Because of my carefully tended twitter feed, 50% I see this morning is people comparing a handful of fares to show that Andy Burnham is ace and/or a prick. Because the data, the truth, the proof, is almost inaccessible, we're just playing with examples. In France, it's #opendata.

item.description:

Een veel relevantere vraag is waar de stijging in sterfte nu vandaan komt!
https://t.co/uYBEw1xJXs https://t.co/MlBzX11MaI

item.title: #es @ 1451081572434731009
item.description:
Los accidentes con patinetes eléctricos en Madrid van al alza (imagino que correlado con su uso). Sobre todo, los tienen menores y veintañeros en barrios del centro y Carabanchel. En 2021 han ocasiado 1 muerto y 18 graves.
Hecho con @graphext + datos abiertos de Madrid https://t.co/QSJxRZihFq

item.title: #fi @ 1450775287134834688
item.description:
@lasleh @Afterserein @mika_salminen @nytimes @mapetti @THLorg @STM_Uutiset @valtioneuvosto @SuomenEduskunta @AVItwiittaa @MarinSanna @anna_maja @liandersson @AnnikaSaarikko @MarkusLohi @MiaLaiho Virallisten tuhansien sivujen tutkimusasiakirjojen leimaaminen salaliittoteorioiksi on @laslehsama kuin väittäisit julkisesti maan olevan pannukakku, eikä pyöreä.
Kertoen enemmän sinusta ja päääristäsi kuin siitä, että kunnioittaisit #OpenData #OpenScience periaatteita. 🤔

item.title: #es @ 1450772785429688374
item.description:
¿En qué medio de transporte iban las 353 personas que en 2021 han pasado más de un día ingresados en un hospital o muerto (16) por accidente de tráfico en Madrid?
El 52% en moto, el 8% en bici, 5.4% en patinete vs 24% en coche.
Hecho con @graphext + datos abiertos de @MADRID https://t.co/LCub3fAKrK

item.title: #es @ 1450682841881325570
item.description:
Va poco más de una semana que el reporte que presenta Sheinbaum no modifica la cifra de casos activos estimados ni su cambio diario.
Actualmente, según los datos abiertos de la SSa en CDMX existen 5,344 casos activos, cerca de lo máximo registrado en 1era ola.
Síganse cuidando. https://t.co/z0BX5VvEhX https://t.co/4LmJj5ELdo

item.title: #es @ 1450680041885536258

item.title: #en @ 1450651022586781700
item.description: Although evening PHU reports for the calendar day do not always translate to Ontario's official morning updates (based on 1pm cutoff and different defns), I'll add that the CC Open Data Working Group has 282 new Ontario cases for today.
